com.epam.java2021.library.dao.impl.mysql.util

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.java2021.library.dao.impl.mysql.util.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class serves transaction and non-transaction logic for DAO and helps to get connection, if DAO doesn't have it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transaction(java.sql.Connection c)
      Class can be initiated with real Connection, then it'll be used in all operation and won't be closes.
      Transaction(ConnectionPool pool)
      For testing purpose is possible to initiate class with your connection pool

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T noTransactionWrapper(DaoReader<T> reader)
      Non-transaction logic: get connection, proceed with read logic, close connection (or not if it was passed from another DAO)
      void transactionWrapper(DaoChanger changer)
      Set autocommit to false, proceed with changes (DaoChanger ), commits/rollbacks, close connection if it was got from ConnectionPool and don't close it, if it was passed from another DAO

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(ConnectionPool pool)
            throws DaoException
        For testing purpose is possible to initiate class with your connection pool
        Parameters:
        pool - ConnectionPool
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of SQL error

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(java.sql.Connection c)
            throws DaoException
        Class can be initiated with real Connection, then it'll be used in all operation and won't be closes. This is used for Dao within Dao initialization.

        If Connection is null, then new connection will be got out of ConnectionPool. Normal Dao operation

        Parameters:
        c - Connection or null
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of SQL error

    • Method Detail

      • transactionWrapper

        public void transactionWrapper(DaoChanger changer)
                        throws DaoException
        Set autocommit to false, proceed with changes (DaoChanger ), commits/rollbacks, close connection if it was got from ConnectionPool and don't close it, if it was passed from another DAO
        Parameters:
        changer - function which does all change logic in DB
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of DAO/SQL exception

      • noTransactionWrapper

        public <T> T noTransactionWrapper(DaoReader<T> reader)
                           throws DaoException
        Non-transaction logic: get connection, proceed with read logic, close connection (or not if it was passed from another DAO)
        Type Parameters:
        T - Entity type
        Parameters:
        reader - reads info in DB
        Returns:
        entity of given type
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of SQL/DAO exception
